manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tiny Wireless Wifi Camera, Multi-function Mini Cam HD Video Capture, Wi-Fi Live Streaming, Remote Monitor, Motion Activated Push Alerts, Loop Working. 7-Hour Long battery Life, iOS and Android phone Compatible, Card store, Multiple devices & Multi-User supported, Easy to setup and Optional Paid Cloud Service. This wireless security camera for home surveillance would be ideal for anyone who wanted to monitor home security. Portable wifi spy cameras can be placed in any corner of the house, office, warehouse, store, front yard, backyard, garden, garage .

Home Security Camera Advanced Motion Detection Alert You will get the alarm notification quickly from the APP on your phone when hidden mini spy camera detects movements, and you can check the live video on the App which help you keep your home safe in time.

1080P Full HD Night Vision This small hidden camera is equipped with an 8mm lens, a flexible design that lets you place it where you want. Because of its small size but with high-definition camera characteristics, compared with ordinary secret surveillance cameras, it is more unobtrusiveness while recording high-definition pictures.

Work In Three Modes. WAY-1 (Need WiFi Network): Connect your hidden spy camera to a 2.4G WiFi network, then you can remote access to your camera on app from anywhere. You can keep an eye on your home/office. WAY-2(NO WiFi Network): Turn on your hidden nanny cam, then your phone connects to the spy camera's hotspot called "AXXX", then you can launch the app, and you can view the live video and playback video on app. WAY-3(NO WiFi Network): Only insert Micro SD card into your micro spy camera, then turn on your little hidden camera, the your mini security camera will automatically record videos to SD card. If you want to playback the recorded vieo, you can unplug SD card from device and playback videos on computer or laptop.
